txtOilHilite2: Feather oil should only be applied to a horse that has been brushed clean.
txtHelpTrophyRoom: Click to visit the trophy room.
txtHelpFountain: Click to fill the water bowl.
txtHelpStats: Keep a close eye on the status of your horse.
txtHelpSpeaker: Click to soothe the spirits of your horse.
txtHelpWindChime: Summon the wind to blow away the soiled leaves.
txtHelpBerries: Click to select a handful of berries. Carry them to your horse’s mouth and click again for a special treat.
txtHelpAcorn: Click to offer your horse a meal of fresh acorns.
txtHelpWorld: Click to visit the Bella Sara World
txtHelpOil: Click to open the bottle. Click again to apply the scented oil to your horse’s wings.
txtHelpBrush: Click to select a brush. Click again to gently preen the feathers of your horse.
txtHelpBranch: Click to shake loose a bed of fresh leaves.
txtFullHorse: Ton cheval n'a plus faim ni soif.
txtNoMoreLeaves: No more fresh leaves are needed at this time.
txtReadyToBeOiled: Parfait! Les ailes de ton cheval sont prêtes à être huilées.
amorQuote: Use your love to bring peace to the world.
anemoneQuote: Keep your heart open. Believe in getting and giving love.
angelQuote: Angel is coming. Make space and let heaven help you.
aniganQuote: Find something about this moment that makes you laugh.
antheaQuote: You don't have to reach your goal today. Just take one more step.
araQuote: You have the power to forget anger and get along again.
auroraQuote: Nature's energy is all around you every moment.
azuroQuote: Know that you are loved for who you really are.
bellerophonQuote: A real hero needs a loving heart.
bifrostQuote: Where love is there are always miracles.
birdyQuote: Make peace with yourself and your friends.
blossomQuote: Close your eyes and imagine your wildest dream.
boreasQuote: Take on a challenge and you will earn strength and courage.
briosoQuote: You are full of life and energy. Use it to do something great!
cherubQuote: Hope is the magic that turns wishes into goals.
chitimachaQuote: Fly far and explore, but remember the way home.
chromasiaQuote: The sweet sound of your voice makes me smile.
chrysoQuote: Daring to try is a success in itself.
cindraQuote: Let hope lift up your thoughts.
cioccolaQuote: You can do it! Make your dreams come true!
cirraQuote: See the beauty inside your friends.
corcelQuote: Choose a worthy goal and go after it with all your heart.
cosimaQuote: Learning is the key that opens up the whole world to you.
dartQuote: You have the power to change things for the better.
daybreakQuote: Ask your family about themselves. You will learn where you come from.
drekiQuote: More listening and less talking can make things better.
ebenosQuote: Today is another chance to do something wonderful.
embericQuote: You can create miracles in your life. Believe it!
empressQuote: Your spirit is strong and noble. Wear it like a crown of glory.
eurosQuote: Look for the truth in unexpected places.
fairybellQuote: Look for friends who make you feel good.
farfallaQuote: You can fly! Just close your eyes and use your imagination.
firebrightQuote: Let others see the fire that burns so brightly in your heart.
graiaQuote: Spread your wings and be free.
heliaQuote: Doing things together helps our friendship grow.
hilarioQuote: Playing around with something new is a fun way to learn.
honoraQuote: Honor your strengths by using them to do good.
hummingbirdQuote: Go after the point of life.
iceprinceQuote: Let others see who you really are.
isletaQuote: Every day brings new chances. Watch for the right moment.
icarusQuote: Choose to be with people who care about you.
icekingQuote: Hope is like magic. It keeps you full of energy.
irisQuote: Follow the rainbow. Believe in happiness.
jollyQuote: If you're happy you should show it!
joyQuote: Let us try different adventures together as a way to grow and learn.
kendraQuote: Change is a part of life. Learn to enjoy it.
khrysorQuote: Life is full of chances. Anything could happen.
larenaQuote: You are ready to spread your wings and fly!
lukanQuote: You can make this a moment you will always remember.
maxiQuote: To find the way just follow me.
medusaQuote: Take advice from the people you trust.
memoryQuote: Write down your fondest memories and keep them alive forever.
merrydancerQuote: Focus your thoughts on things that make you happy.
mintyQuote: Fly with me to the stars and we will be surrounded by light.
mislaQuote: With me you will be safe and protected by heaven.
mistralQuote: Do what you mean to do.
muskogeeQuote: Everything is more fun when we do it together!
naiadQuote: Something good is about to happen!
nightingaleQuote: Listen to the wind's music and hear what nature tells you.
nikeQuote: Have the courage to trust yourself.
notosQuote: Your heart is big enough to chase your wildest dreams.
nuadaQuote: There is no magic stronger than trying again.
nyxQuote: Let your life take you to exciting places.
odysseyQuote: Your spirit of adventure will take you to great heights.
osageQuote: Be free to change your mind.
pegasusQuote: Your dreams are coming through. I am here to help you trust yourself.
peregrineQuote: Come with me and explore the wide, wonderful world.
phoenixQuote: Learning feeds your sense of wonder.
pirouetteQuote: You have unique gifts. Make the most of the chances they give you.
potawatomiQuote: Your cheerful heart brightens the day for everyone around you.
primroseQuote: The more you learn, the more you grow.
prismaQuote: You have the power to control the way you react.
quinlyQuote: Go looking for joy! You will find it all around you.
rainbowQuote: Sit down, feel the peace. We will enjoy a wonderful time together.
royceQuote: Trust yourself to choose the path that's right for you.
ruskinQuote: Follow your heart and you will create your own success.
seraphiaQuote: You already know what to do. Go ahead and do it!
shawneeQuote: The truth always brings more wisdom.
skinfaxeQuote: Let the sun shine through the darkness and light your path.
speedyQuote: Heaven is working above us. So have some fun even if you don't see results now.
starflyQuote: Listen to the music of nature.
starfrostQuote: It's easier to let go of your fear if you know where it came from.
sugarQuote: Let us join and start your adventure.
tricksyQuote: Spend time with true friends who understand you.
twilightQuote: Surround yourself with exciting friends, who make you feel happy and creative.
uranusQuote: The powers of the universe flow around you and in you. Let them guide you.
valkristQuote: Have faith that you will find the answers you're looking for.
woodlockQuote: Choose a silent moment to open your mind.
zephyrosQuote: Every day, you choose who you will become.
